HERO.TITLE: Clinica Alpina and VetTrust. A strong team.
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Driven by the love for animals, Clinica Alpina offers best medicine on the cutting edge of science and customer service at the highest level - accessible for all.

NEWS.TITLE: News and press releases
NEWS.DESCRIPTION: News and everyday stories about VetTrust.

CLIPPED_CARD.QUOTE: As CEO of VetTrust, it makes me proud to see that our 300+ employees are extremely passionate about putting the welfare of the animals entrusted to us first.

PRACTICE_OWNER.TITLE: Are you a practice owner? Become part of our network!
PRACTICE_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: Do you never want to be on your own again? Do you value broad expertise yet a good work life balance? With us, everything is possible: full integration, complete succession solution or collaboration in subareas.

PRESS_INQUIRIES.TITLE: Press inquiries? We are at your disposal
PRESS_INQUIRIES.DESCRIPTION: We are at your disposal for press inquiries. Please contact Dr. med. vet. FVH Benjamin Biner directly, we will get back to you as soon as possible.

BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_1: As partners, we are as strong as our shared love for animals.
BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_2: We are honestly interested, passionate and progressive together.
BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_3: We are always close to animals and people. We provide the best medicine - accessible to all.
BULLETS.DESCRIPTION_4: We are a value-based Swiss company with high standards for ourselves.
